com.turing123.libs.android.connectivity

Class ConnectionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.turing123.libs.android.connectivity.ConnectionManager

  • public class ConnectionManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class for exchange wifi configuration. WARNING: ALL DATA TRANSMITTED ARE NOT ENCRYPTED. IF YOU DON NOT WANT TO SHARE YOUR WIFI SSID OR PASSWORD PLEASE DO NOT USE THIS CLASS.

    • Field Detail

      • WIFI_CONFIG_PREFIX

        public static final java.lang.String WIFI_CONFIG_PREFIX
        Used for config wifi network over AP mode. Client should send three essential parameters to robot: SSID, password and security type b/t WIFI_CONFIG_PREFIX and WIFI_CONFIG_SUFFIX,separated by colon(:), can NOT be omitted. e.g.

        [WIFI_CONFIG_PREFIX + "ssid:password:WPA2" + WIFI_CONFIG_SUFFIX] as a result: SSID: "ssid" Password: "password" Security Type: "WPA2"

        If colon is included by parameter, escape character(\) must be applied, e.g. [WIFI_CONFIG_PREFIX + "ss\\:id:password:WPA2" + WIFI_CONFIG_SUFFIX] as a result: SSID: "ss:id" Password: "password" Security Type: "WPA2"

        Note: Argument can be empty. But be sure it can be parsed right number of argument, e.g. [WIFI_CONFIG_PREFIX + "::" + WIFI_CONFIG_SUFFIX] as a result: SID: NULL Password: NULL Security Type: NULL Apparently, no argument parsed out, so this will cause an error.

        The following one, however, is valid: [WIFI_CONFIG_PREFIX + ":password:WPA2" + WIFI_CONFIG_SUFFIX] as a result: SSID: "" Password: "password" Security Type: "WPA2"

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • WIFI_CONFIG_SUFFIX

        public static final java.lang.String WIFI_CONFIG_SUFFIX
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • WIFI_CONFIG_ACCEPTED

        public static final java.lang.String WIFI_CONFIG_ACCEPTED
        Used for config wifi network over AP mode. When robot get valid data from client, send WIFI_CONFIG_ACCEPTED, if invalid send WIFI_CONFIG_REJECT back.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        public static final java.lang.String WIFI_CONFIG_REJECT
        See Also:

      • NOTIFICATION_ACTION_STATUS

        public static final java.lang.String NOTIFICATION_ACTION_STATUS
        Notification action of connection status. The network status will be set to Notification.arg1 with one of NOTIFICATION_EXTRA_STATUS_CONNECTED or NOTIFICATION_EXTRA_STATUS_DISCONNECTED
        See Also:

      • TYPE_WIFI_P2P

        public static final int TYPE_WIFI_P2P
        Exchange wifi config over wifi p2p. The identifier should be mac addr of device, separated by colon(:).

    • Method Detail

      • startReceiveAndConnect

        public static void startReceiveAndConnect(android.content.Context appContext,
                                          int type,
                                          com.turing123.libs.android.connectivity.wifi.ap.ApConfiguration apConfiguration,
                                          ConnectionStatusCallback callback,
                                          DataReceiveCallback receiveCallback,
                                          java.lang.String senderId)
        Start receiving wifi configuration and connect to it.
        Parameters:
        appContext - The context
        type - Specify how to receive wifi configuration TYPE_WIFI_P2P
        apConfiguration - wifi configuration for AP mode(cannot be null), or left null for other type
        callback - Callback to receive result
        senderId - The identifier of wifi configuration sender

      • stopConnection

        public static void stopConnection(android.content.Context context,
                                  int type)
        stop the current connection process.
        Parameters:
        context - app context
        type - the type of connection. only support TYPE_WIFI_AP by now
